explanation: [0-0] A black man in a black military uniform is standing in the center of an empty stage. He holds a rifle vertically in front of his chest, his right hand gripping the buttstock and his left hand holding the front of the barrel. Behind him stands another black man in a green military uniform, and to the left are a man and a woman recording the event. Four people in white clothes are standing in the stands farther away.

[0-8] The man with the rifle begins his performance, releasing his left hand from the barrel and holding the rifle with his right hand only. He turns and walks to the right. He slams the butt of the rifle on the ground, then lifts it vertically again while stomping his right foot. He then pats the barrel with his left hand and stomps his right foot again. Then he turns to the left. Behind him, a man in military uniform carefully observes his movements, and behind the blue line are four people holding cameras, two standing, one squatting, and one sitting. The picture slowly darkens.

[13-21] The scene changes again. The black man is still standing on the stage holding the rifle. He reaches out his right hand and catches the rifle falling from the air.
